evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS cloud services to handle data storage and processing needs.
Complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure patient data privacy.
Supports FHIR and HL7 standards for health data interoperability.
Utilizes Azure for its integration middleware solutions.
Implemented EDI transaction sets for efficient data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes health tech standards like HIPAA and integrates APIs for healthcare data exchange.
